amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for the prosecution of enemy combatants in Article III courts of the United States.

action.text: Amendment SA 753 under the order of 10/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 186.

Amendment SA 753 proposed by Senator Ayotte to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6729-6730, S6736, S6737-6738, S6744-6746, S6746-6749, S6751-6752; text: CR S6729-6730) To prohibit the use of funds for the prosecution of enemy combatants in Article III courts of the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 753 proposed by Senator Ayotte to Amendment SA 738.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 753 under the order of 10/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 186.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 753 under the order of 10/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 186.
